functions.name: query
functions.description: Gets all mail tabs that have the specified properties, or all mail tabs if no properties are specified.

active.description: Whether the tabs are active in their windows.

currentWindow.description: Whether the tabs are in the current window.

lastFocusedWindow.description: Whether the tabs are in the last focused window.

windowId.description: The ID of the parent window, or :ref:`windows.WINDOW_ID_CURRENT` for the current window.

functions.name: update
functions.description: Modifies the properties of a mail tab. Properties that are not specified in <var>updateProperties</var> are not modified.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: Defaults to the active tab of the current window.

allOf.description: Sets the folder displayed in the tab. The extension must have an accounts permission to do this.

sortType.description: Sorts the list of messages. <var>sortOrder</var> must also be given.

sortOrder.description: Sorts the list of messages. <var>sortType</var> must also be given.

layout.description: Sets the arrangement of the folder pane, message list pane, and message display pane. Note that setting this applies it to all mail tabs.

folderPaneVisible.description: Shows or hides the folder pane.

messagePaneVisible.description: Shows or hides the message display pane.

functions.name: getSelectedMessages
functions.description: Lists the selected messages in the current folder. A messages permission is required to do this.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: Defaults to the active tab of the current window.

functions.name: setQuickFilter
functions.description: Sets the Quick Filter user interface based on the options specified.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: Defaults to the active tab of the current window.

show.description: Shows or hides the Quick Filter bar.

contact.description: Shows only messages from people in the address book.

tags.description: Shows only messages with tags on them.

allOf.description: Shows only messages matching the supplied text.

events.name: onDisplayedFolderChanged
events.description: Fired when the displayed folder changes in any mail tab.

events.name: onSelectedMessagesChanged
events.description: Fired when the selected messages change in any mail tab.

tags.description: Object keys are tags to filter on, values are true if the message must have the tag, or false if it must not have the tag. For a list of available tags, call the :ref:`messages.listTags` method.

mode.description: Whether all of the tag filters must apply, or any of them.

text.description: String to match against the <var>recipients</var>, <var>sender</var>, <var>subject</var>, or <var>body</var>.

recipients.description: Shows messages where <var>text</var> matches the recipients.

sender.description: Shows messages where <var>text</var> matches the sender.

subject.description: Shows messages where <var>text</var> matches the subject.

body.description: Shows messages where <var>text</var> matches the message body.
